description: Add user criteria after specific_bottom hook.
replace:
$0
<xf:set var="$fieldNameUsernameRegex" value="{$xf.options.thusercriteria_prefix}username_regex" />
<xf:option name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameUsernameRegex}][rule]" value="{$fieldNameUsernameRegex}" selected="{$criteria.{$fieldNameUsernameRegex}}"
		   label="{{ phrase('th_usercriteria_username_matches_regex:') }}">
	<xf:textbox name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameUsernameRegex}][data][regex]" value="{$criteria.{$fieldNameUsernameRegex}.regex}" />
</xf:option>

<xf:set var="$fieldNameNotUsername" value="{$xf.options.thusercriteria_prefix}not_username" />
<xf:option name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameNotUsername}][rule]" value="{$fieldNameNotUsername}" selected="{$criteria.{$fieldNameNotUsername}}"
		   label="{{ phrase('thusercriteria_username_is_not:') }}">
	<xf:textbox name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameNotUsername}][data][names]" value="{$criteria.{$fieldNameNotUsername}.names}" ac="true" />
	<xf:afterhint>{{ phrase('thusercriteria_username_not_criteria_explain') }}</xf:afterhint>
</xf:option>

<xf:set var="$fieldNameNotUsernameSearch" value="{$xf.options.thusercriteria_prefix}not_username_search" />
<xf:option name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameNotUsernameSearch}][rule]" value="{$fieldNameNotUsernameSearch}" selected="{$criteria.{$fieldNameNotUsernameSearch}}"
		   label="{{ phrase('thusercriteria_username_not_contains:') }}">
	<xf:textbox name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameNotUsernameSearch}][data][needles]" value="{$criteria.{$fieldNameNotUsernameSearch}.needles}" />
	<xf:afterhint>{{ phrase('thusercriteria_username_not_search_criteria_explain') }}</xf:afterhint>
</xf:option>

<xf:set var="$fieldNameNotEmail" value="{$xf.options.thusercriteria_prefix}email_not_search" />
<xf:option name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameNotEmail}][rule]" value="{$fieldNameNotEmail}" selected="{$criteria.thusercriteria_email_not_search}"
		   label="{{ phrase('thusercriteria_email_address_not_contains:') }}">
	<xf:textbox name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameNotEmail}][data][needles]" value="{$criteria.{$fieldNameNotEmail}.needles}" />
	<xf:afterhint>{{ phrase('thusercriteria_email_not_search_criteria_explain') }}</xf:afterhint>
</xf:option>

<xf:set var="$fieldNameUsernameNotRegex" value="{$xf.options.thusercriteria_prefix}not_username_regex" />
<xf:option name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameUsernameNotRegex}][rule]" value="{$fieldNameUsernameNotRegex}" selected="{$criteria.{$fieldNameUsernameNotRegex}}"
		   label="{{ phrase('th_usercriteria_username_does_not_match_regex:') }}">
	<xf:textbox name="user_criteria[{$fieldNameUsernameNotRegex}][data][regex]" value="{$criteria.{$fieldNameUsernameNotRegex}.regex}" />
</xf:option>
